CORE TEAM

Falk Benke, CEO

Falk is the resident German, originally from Berlin. He came to Ghana in 2013 to work as a Teaching Fellow at the Meltwater Entrepreneurial School of Technology (MEST). Here, he got excited about entrepreneurship and decided to start his own company out of Ghana. In his freetime, he enjoys travelling West Africa and hanging out at the gym. His favourite Ghanaian dish is Red Red.

Gerald Pharin, CTO

Gerald holds a Science and Physics degree from renowned Kwame Nkrumah University of Science & Technology in Kumasi and is a graduate from Meltwater Entrepreneurial School of Technology. He is an expert in writing scalable code, efficient algorithms, and applying state-of-the-art software development techniques. Gerald cares deeply about using technology to fight poverty and drive social change. Gerald is an active member of his church. When he is not coding out the latest improvements to Beam, Gerald can be found mentoring young people to code or watching animated TV series.

Kingston Tagoe, CPO

After training as an Aerospace engineer at Kwame Nkrumah' University of Science and Technology, Kingston pursued his passion in tech entrepreneurship at Meltwater Entrepreneurial School of Technology and now manages product development at Beam. Kingston is an incredibly talented designer with a weakness for perfection. He is also a magician - no one knows how he always manages to solve even the trickiest valet requests we get from our customers. Kingston loves listening to stories about how the older folks lived pre-independence - and plans on putting them into a book sometime in the future.
